des: "Reward your tastebuds and use up your rhubarb with this delicious, unique dessert. Serve alone or with ice cream and/or whipped cream. "
ins: Place the rhubarb in a large pot and fill with enough water so that it is almost covered. Bring to a boil, then simmer over medium heat until starting to fall apart, about 20 minutes. Stir occasionally. Remove from the heat and stir in the sugar and cinnamon until sugar has dissolved. Serve hot or cold.
